verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David, <WH1732> when he was <WH1961> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Judah. <WH3063> O God, <WH430> thou <WH859> art my God; <WH410> early will I seek <WH7836> thee: my soul <WH5315> thirsteth <WH6770> for thee, my flesh <WH1320> longeth <WH3642> for thee in a dry <WH6723> and thirsty <WH5889> land, <WH776> where no <WH1097> water <WH4325> is;
To see <WH7200> thy power <WH5797> and thy glory, <WH3519> so <WH3651> as I have seen <WH2372> thee in the sanctuary. <WH6944>
Because <WH3588> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> is better <WH2896> than life, <WH4480> <WH2416> my lips <WH8193> shall praise <WH7623> thee.
Thus <WH3651> will I bless <WH1288> thee while I live: <WH2416> I will lift up <WH5375> my hands <WH3709> in thy name. <WH8034>
My soul <WH5315> shall be satisfied <WH7646> as <WH3644> with marrow <WH2459> and fatness; <WH1880> and my mouth <WH6310> shall praise <WH1984> thee with joyful <WH7445> lips: <WH8193>
When <WH518> I remember <WH2142> thee upon <WH5921> my bed, <WH3326> and meditate <WH1897> on thee in the night watches. <WH821>
Because <WH3588> thou hast been <WH1961> my help, <WH5833> therefore in the shadow <WH6738> of thy wings <WH3671> will I rejoice. <WH7442>
My soul <WH5315> followeth hard <WH1692> after <WH310> thee: thy right hand <WH3225> upholdeth <WH8551> me.
But those <WH1992> that seek <WH1245> my soul, <WH5315> to destroy <WH7722> it, shall go <WH935> into the lower parts <WH8482> of the earth. <WH776>
They shall fall <WH5064> by <WH5921> <WH3027> the sword: <WH2719> they shall be <WH1961> a portion <WH4521> for foxes. <WH7776>

But the king <WH4428> shall rejoice <WH8055> in God; <WH430> every one <WH3605> that sweareth <WH7650> by him shall glory: <WH1984> but <WH3588> the mouth <WH6310> of them that speak <WH1696> lies <WH8267> shall be stopped. <WH5534>
